attributes.action: hold a referendum on the issue of Scottish independence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The growing number of opponents to the Union is evident, and therefore we believe that the Prime Minister should be compelled to accept the sovereignty of the electorate, and hold a referendum to truly determine the wishes of the Scottish people to remain united with the rest of the UK, or return to its status as an independent nation.
